overview: Nate and Jarvis are two brothers with the same mother, but are entirely different people. Jarvis is a "church boy" and Nate is into the streets. When Mama gets involved in a car accident they realize what matters most and the importance of putting their differences aside to take care of their mother. As the story unfolds the family issues grow from minor to major and dysfunctional or not, they both know home is where their Mama is and where their hearts truly lie.
title: Dysfunctional 2014
